p: Significant to moderate biofilm reducing activity was observed for several CGEO samples against P. aeruginosa PaO1 strain. Analyzing data showed in Figure 1, the duration of extraction process seems to influence the activity on this strain, since in every month (except October) last fractions (12 h and 24 h) were found to be more effective. Observed efficacy of these last fractions could be potentially associated with the increase of chrysanthenone.
